subject: COME FOR YOUR FUNDS
body:
Dear Sir,

Thank you for your questions and I'm really glad to give you detail breakdown. The funds has been in care of FINANCIAL AGENCY and they instructed me to tell my partner to visit www.wise.com to setup a wise wallet account and link to your local account because the transfer will be done installment and it will be coming to your wise account and from your wise account you will personally move it to your local account where you take your 5% share and send my share to my investment destination. If you need to study more about wise bank you can check it out from Google and you will realize this is a legitimate transaction and not a hoax. The reason I chose to offer you  5% for partnering with me is because I will be responsible for all expenses and procurement of all clearance certificates from the authority and I would not like to involve you with any fees so the transaction is safe and risk free and will not jeopardize any of your information you will put out to actualize it.

So setup a wise wallet account it's simple to open it either from your phone or laptop and link to your local account where you expect to receive the funds when the transfer commence. 

Also provide me these information below.

1. Provide your Scan Identification
2. Provide your Direct Mobile Number on Whats-app
3. Your Residential/Office Address that will be used for agreement and your company or legal names to include in the agreement.
Best Regard
Mr. Emeka Osakwe

subject: Re: COME FOR YOUR FUNDS
body:
Hello Mr. Emeka Osakwe,

Thank you for your detailed explanation about the process. It's really interesting to learn about this Wise Wallet account and how it works. I appreciate your assurance that this is safe and risk-free.

I'm curious, though, why do we need to use a Wise Wallet account? Is there any specific advantage of using it over traditional bank accounts?

Also, I'm not quite sure what you mean by "Provide your Scan". Could you please clarify what kind of scan you're referring to?

As for my direct mobile number and office address, I'm afraid I can't provide them at the moment due to privacy concerns. However, I'd be more than happy to continue our conversation here or through email if that's okay with you.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Richard

subject: Re: COME FOR YOUR FUNDS
body:
Dear Sir,

If you really want us to progress in this partnership you must follow instructions. The funds was deposited with an financial agency and they instructed that wise bank is what they have chosen to use to execute the transaction it's there prerogative. Wise bank is also a traditional bank so you can study about wise bank from Google if you think it's a hoax. 

Again I cannot do business transaction worth $5Million just on email alone without your information it's not possible. Once you provide me information some of it will be used for agreement preparation by my lawyer and I will provide you my information too so if you want us to proceed you must follow my instructions.

This is not a scam and I will reasure you of that over and over.
Best Regard
Mr. Emeka Osakwe

subject: Re: COME FOR YOUR FUNDS
body:
Hello Mr. Emeka Osakwe,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I'm quite interested in learning more about this opportunity, especially about Wise Bank. I'll definitely look it up on Google to understand better.

I understand that doing business requires trust and mutual understanding. However, I would like to know more about the process before sharing any personal details. Could you please explain a bit more about how this agreement works? What kind of information will be used by your lawyer?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Richard

subject: Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Sir,

Please, I need your response urgently. I have finally found a lender that will loan us money to obtain the clearance certificates holding our transaction. As my partner, the lender agreed  to release funding to you for us to obtain the clearance certificate though I will be responsible for paying back after the conclusion of the transaction. 

That is what we agreed upon so below are the required information needed.

Full Legal Names
Direct Email Address
Direct Mobile Number
Your Full Bank Details and Address

I will be waiting for your response quickly.
Best Regard
Mr. Emeka Osakwe

subject: Re: Dear Sir,
body:
Hello Mr. Emeka Osakwe,

Thank you for your message and the opportunity to be part of this venture. I'm glad to hear that you've found a lender who is willing to support us.

However, before we proceed, could you please provide more details about the clearance? What exactly does it entail and why is it necessary? Also, could you explain more about the repayment terms?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Richard

subject: Re: Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Sir,

This is a comprehensive details of the lender and the loan read it.I was reliable made to understand that to obtain those clearance certificates will cost me $170, 000, so I was introduced to a lender that we have been talking on how to raise the money and my application for the loan has just been approved. According to the lender this is not just check you pay into your account without confirmation from your bank so don't be scared you're safe it has nothing to do to your account. 

Please I need you now like never before because you need to be fully involved in this partnership to enable me actualize my dreams. The lender said to me their method to disburse funds is by wire check that will be scanning and emailing to your email box, have it print out and take to the bank for confirmation for payment and that is how other subsequent ones will follow till it completes $170,000 needed. This is my only opportunity and for the loan that is now set for disbursement, it's the lender's  advice that the loan should go through you since it cannot come to my location though I will be responsible for paying back after the transaction is concluded. The loan is just $170,000, but it's structured to be coming through you $5000 daily by installment, as you are receiving it you will be remitting to the agency where to obtain the clearance certificates till it gets to $100,000 which is for the clearance certificates and the $70,000 will be left in your care till we conclude the real transaction incase of any miscellaneous expenses that might arise in the cause of transferring the funds to you. And once the clearance certificates are obtained that is when the real transaction will commence into your account and after that you will deduct your percentage and my share goes for my investment destination as earlier agreed upon. The only information needed to provide for the disbursement of the loan  are stated below. I need you to reconfirm them to me before tomorrow Monday, which is scheduled to disburse the loan to you, thank you.

Please below is the required information needed.

Full Legal Names
Direct Email Address
Direct Mobile Number
Your Full Bank Details and Address

Here is also the contact of the lender you can as well talk to him on my behalf and introduce yourself to him then ask questions.

Name: Edwin Phelps
Tel:      2109205094
Location: USA

I will be waiting for your response quickly.
Best Regard
Mr. Emeka Osakwe

subject: Re: Dear Sir,
body:
Hello Mr. Emeka Osakwe,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. It's quite an interesting proposition, I must say. However, I have a few questions that I'd like to clarify before we proceed further.

Firstly, could you please explain more about the clearance process? How does it work exactly? And why is it necessary for the loan to go through me?

Secondly, you mentioned that the funds will be disbursed daily by wire check. Could you provide more details on how this process works? 

Lastly, regarding the contact of the lender, could you tell me more about him? What is his name and what kind of relationship do you have with him?

I'm sorry but due to privacy concerns, I won't be able to provide my personal details at this stage. However, I'm keen on understanding more about this opportunity.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Richard

subject: Re: Dear Sir,
body: You are just a game man do you really think I have all the time for all your questions. It's very simple and is just one way out, not interested period.

subject: Re: Dear Sir,
body:
Hello there! I understand that you might be busy and I appreciate your time. I'm just trying to understand better. Could you perhaps elaborate a bit more on what you're not interested in? It would help me a lot. Thanks!

Best wishes,
Richard
